content.question: Which of the following statements from the first paragraph most directly expresses the author’s thesis in the passage?

choices.label: “I washed away this tincture of foreignness with language.” (sentence 3)
“[M]y pleasure in language feels largely independent of any other identity.” (sentence 4)
“[M]y own failure at Japanese gave me direct experience of illiteracy.” (sentence 7)

content.answer: “I washed away this tincture of foreignness with language.” (sentence 3)

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
